premium.title: Upgrade your plan
premium.content:
Your plan doesn't allow you to **modify your documents online**.

To unlock this feature, or simply support us, you can change your Cozy plan.

public.title: Information
public.content: You cannot edit this file online. Please ask the document owner to update their Cozy subscription.

default.title: Information
default.content: Your current plan does not allow you to take advantage of this feature.
